artist: Artist: J.R. Williams; Publisher: Brownfield Press
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Photomechanical text and illustration of a tuxedoed figure, on the right, standing on a vinyl record printed in color offset lithography on coated paper; title card for set of 10 collector cards
title: DIG: Utter(ed) Madness On Record. 10 Collector Cards
